title: John Day Fossil Beds National Monument: Other Resources
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Other Resources              Other Resources       Click here for more educational materials from the NPS To learn more about ancient horses, visit Fossil Horses in Cyberspace, an exhibit on the University of Florida's website. Hey Teachers! Check out this website about science and evolution. evolution.berkeley.edu Do you want to be a paleontologist? See how paleontologists at the Denver Museum of Natural History do their work.
